channel.title: Community on ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in Community on ZAP

item.title: Automated ZAP Scans for Orchard Core Apps
item.description: If you have an app running on the ASP.NET Core web framework and CMS Orchard Core, you can now easily run ZAP scans for it.

item.title: Community - Tips and Tricks
item.description: News about a community area to contribute ZAP usage tips and tricks.
